definition: dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
stubble land after crop has been taken/a second crop obtained by rotation of land/an opportunity
erhua variant of 話茬|话茬[hua4 cha2]

sentences.english: Ms. Olin, teacher of sixth-grade French, nearly shouted.
sentences.chinese: 六年級法語老師歐林搶過話茬兒，幾乎就要叫出來了。

sentences.english: Most of the time, the other person will eventually pick up the conversation end the silence.
sentences.chinese: 大部分時候，對方會打破沉默，接上話茬。

sentences.english: Whether or how to take turns is a thing of tactics.
sentences.chinese: 是否或如何接話茬，是一件很有策略的事情。
